text: Isabelle Sadoyan (12 May 1928 – 10 July 2017) was a French-Armenian actress. She was the wife of actor Jean Bouise. In her career, she was directed by Jeanne Moreau, Claude Chabrol, Claude Lelouch, Luc Besson, Jean-Luc Godard, Henri Verneuil, Bertrand Tavernier, Robert Kechichian and Krzysztof Kieślowski. Sadoyan was known for her roles as Alice in the 1982 movie The Hatter's Ghost alongside Charles Aznavour. Her last role was as Mrs. Warner in the 2016 movie Irreplaceable.
